QueryDefinition.Query: select ch.person_id as PersonId, test_name, result_date, result_time, encid, CASE WHEN relative_indicator = '<=' THEN 4171754 WHEN relative_indicator = '>=' THEN 4171755 WHEN relative_indicator = '<' THEN 4171756 WHEN relative_indicator = '=' THEN 4172703 WHEN relative_indicator = '>' THEN 4172704 ELSE NULL END as OperatorConceptId, replace(replace(test_result, chr(9), ' '), chr(11), ' ') as test_result, replace(replace(result_unit, chr(9), ' '), chr(11), ' ') as result_unit, replace(replace(normal_range, chr(9), ' '), chr(11), ' ') as normal_range from {sc}.labs l JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND l.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by 1
